text:
Здравейте,

Препращам този мейл, като предполагам това са заплатите за Гърция.

 

From: Vasilhs Papazois <vasilhs_papazois@hotmail.com> 
Sent: Monday, January 22, 2024 11:38 AM
To: Nikolai Hadzhiysky <n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com>
Cc: Kristina Lazarova <k.lazarova@tibiel.com>; Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com>; Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com>; Athanasios Konstantopoulos <Akon@tibiel.com>
Subject: PAYMENT OF SALARY 01/2024 AND OBLIGATIONS TO THE GREEK PUBLIC UNTIL 31/01/2024 AND INVOICE

 

Good morning to all

 

I am sending you the obligations of the month which must be paid strictly by 31/01/2024.

 

* Pay attention to the orders to be on time because they are made by a foreign bank and there is a delay of a few days, make sure the payments appear on the deadline dates. (we always recommend that they be executed the day before the deadline)

Please send me the copies by e-mail when the payments are made.

 

 

Με εκτίμηση
